title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 503.1 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 503.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth uniform procedures
for the conduct of adjudicatory proceedings, as defined in section 102 of the

State Administrative Procedure Act, within the Office of Mental Health. Such
procedures are intended to assure that all adjudicatory proceedings are
impartial, efficient, timely, expert and fair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
503.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
